# tabImage

**Instance Property**

An image that represents the content of the tab.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tabImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This image has precedence over any system item that [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPTemplate/tabSystemItem] specifies, and CarPlay only uses it when the template is a root-template of a tab bar.

## Accessing Tab Information

- **tabTitle**: A short title that describes the content of the tab.
- **tabSystemItem**: A system object that provides a title and image for common tab content, such as contacts or favorites.
- **showsTabBadge**: An indicator you use to call attention to the tab.
